function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited emphasis on designing, constructing, and operating buildings with occupant health and well-being as an objective","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases propagation within the built environment","Mitigation":"Emphasize continuous monitoring, development, codifying, and promotion of healthy building initiatives","Technologies":"Building management systems, IoT sensors, air filtration systems","People":"Building professionals and occupants","Owner":"Researchers, practitioners, building professionals"},{"Description":"Resistance to the healthy building movement","Impact":"Slow adoption of healthy building practices, leading to increased risk of contagious diseases propagation","Mitigation":"Promote concrete examples and tangible benefits of healthy building initiatives","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, case studies, data analysis tools","People":"Building professionals, stakeholders","Owner":"Leaders in the healthy building movement"},{"Description":"Scarcity of real-world cases and lack of confidence in healthy building initiatives","Impact":"Uncertainty and skepticism leading to slow adoption of healthy building practices","Mitigation":"Translation of abstract concepts into tangible examples, showcasing the benefits of healthy buildings","Technologies":"Visualization tools, case studies, data analysis tools","People":"Building professionals, stakeholders","Owner":"Leaders in the healthy building movement"}]}
